3.2. Examples demonstrating how to py-fmas for other models¶

This gallery contains examples that demonstrate how submodules of the py-fmas library can be used to perform numerical simulations for unrelated models.

Interaction of solitons in the Korteweg-deVries equation¶

Download all examples in Python source code: gallery_examples_02_python.zip

Download all examples in Jupyter notebooks: gallery_examples_02_jupyter.zip
